scripts.run-html-harness: pnpm --filter cps-global-components build --intro 'window.cps_global_components_build = window.cps_global_components_build || {Sha: "local", RunId: 0};' && cp -r ./packages/cps-global-components/dist/cps-global-components.js ./apps/harness-html/src/assets/ && pnpm --filter harness-html start
